channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Qradar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Qradar

item.title: CVE-2020-4274|2024-09-16T16:22:44.252Z -- ibm -- qradar
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 2 could allow an authenticated user to access data and perform unauthorized actions due to inadequate permission checks. IBM X-ForceID: 175980.

item.title: CVE-2019-4454|2024-09-16T16:28:14.174Z -- ibm -- qradar
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3.0 to 7.3.2 Patch 4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 163618.
